title: Maurice's famous tabbouleh
ingredients: ['280g coarse bulgur, rinsed and drained', '2 cucumbers, finely diced', '2 large tomatoes, diced', '2 bunches fresh parsley leaves, chopped', '2 bunches spring onions, finely chopped', '2 onions, finely diced', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '120ml olive oil', '1 lemon, juiced', '3/4 tablespoon salt, or to taste', '1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper']
